WorkItem.Description:
High priority as the optimal choice for bear is two elixirs, NOT the AGI flask, for many settings of boss handler (including "average boss 10m 11.0").
 
Steps to reproduce:
File-> New
Set Profession to Alchemy
Buffs tab, scroll down to elixirs
Select Elixir of Deep Earth
Select Elixir of Deep Earth (Mixology)
Select Elixir of the Master
Select Elixir of the Master (Mixology)
Note that the deep earth mixology just unchecked itself.  This is not correct.  Both mixologies should be active.
 
I did not go though and exhaustively check other mixologies.  Others could be off as well.
WorkItem.Summary: [Buffs] Cannot select certain valid buff combinations

Comments.Message: OMG, again with these damn mixology bonuses. I swear I've fixed them in like 5 different versions now.
I've reported this same mixology bug like 3 times.  It's always the same issue heh.
